tdd_ul_dl_config.title: TDD Configuration
enum: DDDSUUDDDD (5ms,   7DL/2UL), S-slot=6DL:4GP:4UL, same ratios as default
DDDSUUUUDD (5ms,   5DL/4UL), S-slot=6DL:4GP:4UL, balanced downlink and uplink
DDSUUUUUUU (5ms,   2DL/7UL), S-slot=6DL:4GP:4UL, EXPERIMENTAL very high uplink

dl_nr_arfcn.title: DL NR ARFCN
dl_nr_arfcn.description: Downlink NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell

ul_nr_arfcn.title: UL NR ARFCN
ul_nr_arfcn.description: Uplink NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell. By default a frequency corresponding to dl_nr_arfcn and nr_band is chosen.

ssb_nr_arfcn.title: SSB NR ARFCN
ssb_nr_arfcn.description: SSB NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell. If set it must be an element of global synchronization raster and be at offset from center DL frequency that aligns with SSB subcarrier spacing of selected band. By default a valid frequency nearby dl_nr_arfcn is chosen.

ssb_pos_bitmap.title: SSB Position Bitmap
ssb_pos_bitmap.description: SSB position bitmap in bits (4, 8 or 64 bits depending on the DL frequency).

root_sequence_index.description: Range 0 to 837 for PRACH format up to 3, 0 to 137 otherwise. prach-RootSequenceIndex parameter. It must be different for each neighbour cell operating on the same frequency and sharing the same PRACH configuration.

cipher_algo_pref.title: Preferred Cipher algorithms
cipher_algo_pref.decription: Set the preferred algorithms for RRC and User Plane encryption in decreasing order of preference. If none match the UE capabilities, then NEA0 (no encryption) is selected

integ_algo_pref.title: Preferred Integrity algorithms
integ_algo_pref.decription: Set the preferred algorithms for RRC integrity (and optionally User Plane integrity) check in decreasing order of preference. If none match the UE capabilities, then NIA0 (no integrity check) is selected. (Default: NEA2, NEA1)

tac.title: Tracking Area Code
tac.description: Tracking Area Code (range: 0x0001 to 0xffffff except 0xfffffe, format: integer or hexadecimal starting by 0x)
